start: There sure are a lot of people here...
Hey Sgt. Bob! Fancy meeting you here.
Hey Sgt. John, have you heard about this whole Board of Directors thing?
Yeah, Cindy in accounting said they're coming here.
They're gonna deal with this whole haunting personally. That's why they've called us all here.
The boss always says 'never underestimate the power of money.'
end: What do you think those security guys meant?
Knowing these guys? It means you're going to deal with a lot of stupidity in the near future.
